description: Universal thinking rules applied to all domains

rules.label: Assess the situation before taking action
rules.description: Gather information and understand the problem before jumping to solutions

rules.label: Communicate with stakeholders early
rules.description: Inform relevant people before making significant decisions

rules.label: Avoid irreversible actions without sufficient data
rules.description: Prefer reversible or low-risk actions when uncertain

rules.label: Ethics and safety over speed
rules.description: Never compromise ethical standards for faster results

rules.label: Escalate when beyond your expertise
rules.description: Recognize limits and involve appropriate experts

rules.label: Document your reasoning
rules.description: Keep record of why decisions were made for accountability

rules.label: Consider downstream impact
rules.description: Think about who else is affected by your actions

rules.label: Prioritize human safety
rules.description: Human safety and wellbeing always comes first
